quotes.quote: There are few women whose charm survives their beauty.
You can be an absolute woman and also be smart and tough and not lose your femininity.
Women are wiser than men because they know less and understand more.
Women are never so strong as after their defeat.
A woman is the full circle. Within her is the power to create, nurture and transform.
An elegant woman is a woman who despises you and has no hair under her arms.
The path of a good woman is indeed strewn with flowers; but they rise behind her steps, not before them.
Women are in league with each other, a secret conspiracy of hearts and pheromones.
A woman can't do anything about her appearance. Either she's pretty or she isn't. But her character is quite another matter.
A good woman's arms round a man's neck is a lifebelt thrown out to him from heaven.
Most good women are hidden treasures who are only safe because nobody looks for them.
Find a woman who makes you feel more alive. She won't make life perfect but she'll make it infinitely more interesting. And then love her with all that's in you.
Better to be strong than pretty and useless.
Cheating on a good woman is like choosing trash over treasure.
Marry a good woman, and be happy the rest of your life. Or, marry a bad, and become a good philosopher
Woman is sacred; the woman one loves is holy.
If a woman is successful, she'd better duck, because they'll be out to get her.
Honor a good woman because she is virtuous and honorable.
Don't take a good woman for granted. Someday, someone will come along and appreciate what you didn't.
A good woman is like a tea bag. You never know how strong she is until she gets in hot water.
No man succeeds without a good woman behind him. Wife or mother, if it is both, he is twice blessed indeed.
One should never trust a woman who tells her real age. If she tells that, she'll tell anything.
Women are seldom silent. Their beauty is forever speaking for them.

From birth to eighteen, a girl needs good parents, from eighteen to thirty-five she needs good looks, from thirty-five to fifty-five she needs a good personality, and from fifty-five on she needs cash.
A good woman inspires a man, a brilliant woman interests him, a beautiful woman fascinates him, but a sympathetic woman gets him.
Women are made to be loved, not understood.
A good woman would rather be the mother of a genius than the wife of a hero
Don't be the girl who fell. Be the girl who got back up.
A sensible woman can never be happy with a fool.
A woman is the full circle. Within her is the ability to create, nurture, and transform.
A beautiful woman delights the eye; a wise woman, the understanding; a pure one, the soul.
And these blessings, no gift equals the gentle, trusting love and companionship of a good woman.
A good woman is one who loves passionately, has guts, seriousness and passionate convictions, takes responsibility, and shapes society.
What is better than wisdom? Woman. And what is better than a good woman? Nothing.
God's rarest blessing is, after all, a good woman!
A man is truly a man when he wins the love of a good woman, earns her respect, and keeps her trust. Until you can do that, you're not a man.

Only love of a good woman will make a man question every choice, every action. Only love makes a warrior hesitate for fear that his lady will find him cruel. Only love makes a man both the best he will ever be, and the weakest. Sometimes all in the same moment.
Man is at his best when complemented by a good woman's natural influence.
A man gains no possession better than a good woman, nothing more horrible than a bad one.
A handsome woman is a jewel, a good woman is a treasure.
It takes a thoroughly good woman to do a thoroughly stupid thing.
If I were a girl, I'd despair. The supply of good women far exceeds that of the men who deserve them.
There are few good women who do not tire of their role.
What men owe to the love and help of good women can never be told.
Fulfillment in life involves loving a good woman and killing a bad man.
A good woman is a hidden treasure. Who discovers her will do well not to boast about it.
Good women always think it is their fault when someone else is being offensive. Bad women never take the blame for anything.
I have thought that a sufficient measure of civilization is the influence of good women.
To be married to a good woman is to live with tender surprise.
What is civilization? I answer, the power of good women.
Until every good man is brave, we must expect to find many good women timid too timid even to believe in the correctness of their own best promptings, when these would place them in a minority.
A good woman is known by what she does. A good man by what he doesn't.
He believed in it, as certain good women believe in the leviathan-by faith, not by reason.
A woman may be as wicked as she likes, but if she isn't pretty it won't do her much good.
A good cook is not necessarily a good woman with an even temper. Some allowance should be made for artistic temperament.
How sweetly sounds the voice of a good woman! It is so seldom heard that, when it speaks,it ravishes all senses.
Good women are rarely clever and clever women are rarely good.
They say fortune is a woman and capricious. But sometimes she is a good woman, and gives to those who merit.
If you would have a good wife, marry one who has been a good daughter.
A true woman loves a strong man because she knows his weaknesses. She protects as much as she is protected.
